name: Basketball Stars Battle
description:
Basketball Shooter Stars is a free sports multiplayer basketball games that you can play with peoples around the world and kill your free time!

Playing Basketball Shooter Stars you will be impressed by competition that goes between all top players, so try to be a Star between Top 100 basketball shooter stars!

* 3 GAMEPLAY MODES
** AWESOME LOCATIONS
*** NICE GRAPHICS & SOUNDS
**** MULTIPLE FREE CASH OPTIONS
